name: Sears
description: The Sears Open API Platform provides access to all of the Sears Holdings' storefronts. This includes the Sears, Kmart and MyGofer platforms. By utilizing one of the seven different Application Programming Interfaces (APIs), programmers can get information on the product catalog, full product information including pricing, availability, specifications, descriptions, image URLs. Each API supports the xml / json response format.
